description: A list of solicitors accredited to deal with cases where a child is taken abroad without a parent's permission.

details.body:
All solicitors are accredited by the International Child Abduction Contact Unit (ICACU) for meeting the standards required for this work.

Find out how to apply to join the ICACU referral list.
